sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Despite the diplomacy still taking place, U.S. President Joe Biden said on Friday he's still convinced President Vladimir Putin has decided to invade Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: You know, look, we have reason to believe the Russian forces are planning to and intend to attack Ukraine in the coming week, in the coming days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We believe that they will target Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, a city of 2.8 million innocent people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But I say again, Russia can still choose diplomacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It is not too late to de-escalate and return to the negotiating table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Others are still at that table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken met U.K. Foreign Secretary Liz Truss and German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock in Munich on Friday. Blinken is attending the annual Munich Security Conference, where he aims to ensure the unity of Washington's European allies over Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But satellite imagery of Russian forces suggests Putin's mind is made up. Vast numbers of troops, field hospitals and air assets are still amassing on the border with Ukraine, including in Belarus and Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: U.S. defense officials say an estimated 40 to 50 percent of ground units have moved into attack positions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Two key pro-Russian leaders in the region have announced a mass evacuation of citizens to Russia from eastern Ukraine and claim that people are fleeing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Western leaders see such moves as Moscow attempting to sow fear as an excuse for military intervention in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Putin said those arriving would receive a payment of 10,000 rubles, around 114 euros, not a lot to leave your home behind. And on Friday, pro-separatist leaders claimed a bomb in a car exploded near their administrative building in Donetsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Though no casualties were reported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: All a smokescreen cooked up by Moscow, according to Ukrainian security officials, who insist it's all simply Russian provocation. Today, two persons made statements regarding an evacuation of the citizens of Luhansk and Donetsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: As if the Ukrainian army planned to attack those regions to get back our territories, I can say that these statements have nothing to do with reality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: With so many Russian troops poised on its borders, Western defense analysts say any move by Kiev to attack the two Moscow-backed self-proclaimed republics would be simply madness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: After knocking out power to tens of thousands of homes in the UK, Storm Eunice hit northern France on Friday, landing on the coast of the Normandy region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Five French departments were subjected to an orange weather warning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Many rail services were being suspended and people were advised to stay at home as much as possible and to secure items that could be blown away.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: In neighbouring western Belgium, high winds toppled a crane in the city of Tournai, causing it to damage part of a hospital. Other than the crane operator, no one was hurt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Rail transport in Belgium was also impacted by the storm, with train services suspended in parts of Flanders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: In the west of the region, there were no trains at all on Friday between 2 and 6pm. Despite warnings to steer clear and stay indoors, some people wandered out to the coastline near The Hague as storm Eunice struck the Netherlands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The gale force winds also blew off part of the roof of the ADO Den Haag football stadium and sent roof debris flying.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The Dutch emergency services said two people had also been killed by falling trees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: And in Ireland, a local authority worker was also killed by a falling tree on Friday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It's thought the victim, who was in his 50s, was working with a colleague clearing other fallen trees when the accident happened.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Greek authorities say 12 people are still missing, 8 of them Bulgarian, after a blaze swept through a ferry sailing from Greece to Italy early on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Firefighters on Saturday were still battling to put out the flames on the Euroferry Olympia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: 278 people have been rescued and taken to the island of Khufu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: We were waiting for four hours before the rescuers came. We were in the fire, in the night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: We only felt the fire underneath our feet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: 250 people were screaming, shouting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Some of them were jumping into the sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Some of our friends are still missing. We don't know where they are.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Divers have been brought in to widen the search for those still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Media reported that 10 of those rescued were taken to hospital with breathing difficulties and minor injuries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Officials said they still don't know how the fire started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It's a normal day for the thousands of Afghans living in this resort in Albania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Five months ago, this place by the Adriatic Sea became a safe haven for them after they narrowly escaped death or persecution in their Taliban-ruled homeland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This is a very friendly country I have seen in all of my life. I traveled to the neighbor of Afghanistan, for example, Pakistan, Iran, India, I was been there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But when I came here, I feel it's like my home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Albania, Kosovo, North Macedonia and Canada were the only countries that answered the U.S US government call to shelter Afghan refugees evacuated by American troops in the aftermath of the Taliban takeover.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: About 2,400 arrived in Albania in August last year to stay temporarily until their application for immigration visas to US or Canada is approved. Canada has an agreement with the US to offer them a legal immigrant status.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: About 300 have been issued visas and have already left.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The rest are still waiting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: For the US, you have to have a case before coming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The process is like you cannot apply from Albania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: If you don't have one from Afghanistan when you come here, it is extremely difficult to appeal to the US government to accept you as a refugee.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The process for Canadians are very short, it's simple and it's not as complicated as going to the US.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Canada is generally a bit faster in processing the resettlement because we're only here for five months and we started on our application like three, three and a half months ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There are no guarantees that all of the refugees will get visas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The U.S. government has made no commitment towards that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Their stay in Albania is currently sponsored by 12 American non-profit organizations, some of which were their employers back in Afghanistan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: My family is still left behind in Afghanistan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sometimes I contact them via telephone and they are fine but still I worried about them. I don't know what happened to them. They're a bit safe but not that nobody can guarantee what will happen in the future. For now these refugees only have Albania but they feel welcome here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Albania people is very good people and when we go for shopping, all of love and it's very good people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It's a new community adjusting to life outside their homeland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Winter International Festival of Arts has kicked off in Sochi, putting this southern city at the center of Russian cultural life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This year the festival celebrates its 15th anniversary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The festival's program, as usual, is very diverse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Classics, jazz, ballet, experimental productions and, of course, premieres.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The program traditionally opens with the play Don't Leave Your Planet, which was created at this festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It premiered in Sochi in 2016 and has been sold out ever since.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This fantasy based on The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry stars one of Russia's most famous artists, Konstantin Khovensky, who alone plays all the roles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: What awaits a person when he finds himself in an endless desert?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Inevitable death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And in order to be reborn, you need to confess to yourself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Very simple.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And this confession is laid down by Exuberi and is presented as a children's fairy tale, because it's easier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But in fact, it's far from a children's fairy tale, and we tried to present it as a confession of a man.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Moscow Soloists Chamber Orchestra, conducted by the festival's artistic director Yuri Bashmet, plays on stage during the whole performance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This, of course, is a solo performance. Konstantin leads it from beginning to end.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But the music is not just a background, it plays a role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And not just some kind of episodic one, it plays the second main role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The festival brings together a star-studded cast of world-famous musicians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Austrian singer Max Emanuel Zenchich, who was described as the best countertenor of our time by the Opera Noire magazine, explains why he chose Mozart's arias for this festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In this festival there is a competition with young composers and I thought it was a good idea to bring also something that young Mozart performed in Milan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The 15th Winter International Arts Festival will end on February 27th.
